content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let us focus on discussing the rental price for now. To begin negotiations, please propose a price that you find suitable for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and excellent features of the apartment, I initiate the negotiation with a proposed price of 650 Euros per month. However, I hope to reach a lower agreement after further discussions.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your initial proposal of 650 Euros per month, Farhad. However, as the landlord looking to maximize my returns, my counteroffer begins at 750 Euros. Let us see where further discussions lead us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While understanding your perspective as the landlord, I find your initial counteroffer higher than what I had anticipated. If we cannot meet in the middle, I may need to reconsider my options. However, I am eager to continue negotiating to find a suitable rental price for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concerns, Farhad. In an effort to reach a mutually agreeable solution, I am willing to lower my counteroffer from 750 to 725 Euros per month. Let us see if we can proceed from here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your revised offer of 725 Euros per month demonstrates a positive step towards a potential agreement. However, it is still higher than my initial proposal of 650 Euros. I would like to see if we can further reduce the price to meet my budget constraints.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Though I aim to receive a profitable rent, I remain open to finding common ground, Farhad. In response to your request for further reduction, I will lower my asking price to 700 Euros per month. Let us see if this new offer satisfies your budget requirements.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your latest counteroffer of 700 Euros per month is certainly more favorable to my initial budget considerations. While I would still prefer a lower price, I recognize the need for compromise. I agree to the price of 700 Euros for the apartment rental! TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
